block.p: GLAZER-Adele. On May 24, 2000, age 83. Beloved wife of the late Benjamin. Loving mother of Rashi, Eliot and Ira. Mother-in-law of Margaret. Adored sister of Eleanor Gilbert and Myron Adler and sister-in-law of George Gilbert and Elaine Adler. Good night, we love you mother. Graveside service Friday 11 AM at Mt. Eden Cemetery, Valhalla, New York. For directions call Riverside Memorial Chapels.
